item.name: Archive Log
item.description: Archive log production for trend analysis.

item.name: Database Size
item.description: Database size including data files, REDO log files, control files and temporary files.

item.name: File Size
item.description: Database files size including data files and temporary files.

item.name: Latch Misses
item.description: Number of times the latch was requested in willing-to-wait mode and the requester had to wait.

item.name: Uptime
item.description: Database uptime in seconds.

item.name: Version
item.description: Identifies Oracle database software release.

item.name: Hitratio Body
item.description: Percent of GETHITS to GETS for BODY namespace.

item.name: Hitratio Sql Area
item.description: Percent of GETHITS to GETS for SQL AREA namespace.

item.name: Hitratio Table Procedures
item.description: Percent of GETHITS to GETS for TABLE & PROCEDURE namespace.

item.name: Hitratio Trigger
item.description: Percent of GETHITS to GETS for TRIGGER namespace.

item.name: Pin Hitratio Body
item.description: Number of times a PIN was requested for objects of BODY namespace.

item.name: Pin Hitratio Sql Area
item.description: Number of times a PIN was requested for objects of SQL AREA namespace.

item.name: Pin Hitratio Table Procedures
item.description: Number of times a PIN was requested for objects of TABLE & PROCEDURE namespace.

item.name: Pin Hitratio Trigger
item.description: Number of times a PIN was requested for objects of TRIGGER namespace.

item.name: Aggregate Target
item.description: Current value of the PGA_AGGREGATE_TARGET initialization parameter. If this parameter is not set, then its value is 0 and automatic management of PGA memory is disabled.

item.name: Consumed Bytes
item.description: Indicates how much PGA memory is currently consumed by work areas. This number can be used to determine how much memory is consumed by other consumers of the PGA memory (for example, PL/SQL or Java).

item.name: Count
item.description: Number of the currently active processes.

item.name: Max
item.description: Maximum number of operating system processes that can simultaneously connect to Oracle.

item.name: Active
item.description: Number of the currently active user sessions.

item.name: Connected Users
item.description: Number of active user connections.

item.name: Inactive
item.description: Number of the currently inactive user sessions.

item.name: Max
item.description: The maximum number of sessions that can be created in the system.

item.name: System
item.description: Number of the currently active system sessions.

item.name: Total
item.description: Number of the all sessions.

item.name: Buffer Cache Size
item.description: Size of the buffer cache in bytes.

item.name: Dictionary Cache Size
item.description: Size of memory allocated for data dictionary in bytes, which is a read-only set of tables that provides information about the database.

item.name: Fixed Sga Size
item.description: Size in bytes of general information about the state of the database and the instance.

item.name: Java Pool Free Size
item.description: Free memory of Java pool in bytes.

item.name: Java Pool Size
item.description: Size of Java pool memory in bytes.

item.name: Large Pool Free Size
item.description: Free memory of large pool in bytes.

item.name: Large Pool Size
item.description: Size of Java pool large in bytes.

item.name: Library Cache Size
item.description: Size of memory allocated for library cache in bytes, which includes includes the shared SQL areas, private SQL areas, PL/SQL procedures and packages, and control structures such as locks and library cache handles.

item.name: Log Buffer Size
item.description: Size of memory allocated for the REDO log buffer.

item.name: Shared Pool Free Size
item.description: Free memory of shared pool in bytes.

item.name: Shared Pool Size
item.description: Memory allocated for the rest of shared pool components (excluding library cache, dictionary cache, free memory and SQL area).

item.name: Sql Area Size
item.description: Size of memory allocated for SQL areas.

item.name: Block Changes
item.description: Get statistic that counts the total number of changes that were part of an update or delete operation that were made to all blocks in the SGA.

item.name: Block Gets
item.description: Number of times a CURRENT block was requested

item.name: Consistent Gets
item.description: Number of consistent gets that require both block rollbacks and block cleanouts.

item.name: Datafile Reads
item.description: Number of reads directly from disk, bypassing the buffer cache.

item.name: Datafile Writes
item.description: Number of writes directly to disk, bypassing the buffer cache (as in a direct load operation).

item.name: Hit Ratio
item.description: Get the buffer cache hit ratio that is how often a requested block has been found in the buffer cache without requiring disk access.

item.name: NotIndexed Sql Ratio
item.description: Percent of tables that do not meet the short table criteria and cannot be defined by optimizer hints.

item.name: Physical Reads
item.description: Total number of data blocks read from disk into buffer cache.

item.name: Redo Writes
item.description: Total number of writes by LGWR to the REDO log files.

item.name: Control File IO
item.description: Number of control file reads and writes.

item.name: Direct Path Reads
item.description: Number of outstanding asynchronous I/O awating to be completed to disk.

item.name: File IO
item.description: Number of events of identifying a file so that it can be opened later or opening the file.

item.name: Log Writes
item.description: Number of log file writes.

item.name: Multi Block Reads
item.description: Number of session waits while reading multiple data blocks.

item.name: Other
item.description: Number of miscellaneous server events

item.name: Single Block Reads
item.description: Number of session waits while while a sequential read from the database is performed.

item.name: Sql Net
item.description: Number of server messages from and to the clients.

item_prototype.name: {#JMX.NAME} Actual Size
item_prototype.description: Size of all data files in bytes.

item_prototype.name: {#JMX.NAME} Free Size
item_prototype.description: Size of all free extents in bytes.

item_prototype.name: {#JMX.NAME} Max Size
item_prototype.description: Maximum auto-extensible size of all data files in bytes.

item_prototype.name: {#JMX.NAME} Used
item_prototype.description: Size of tablespace data in bytes.
